data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4, Tablet Allview Viva H8 LTE
data.actual_result: The button is white and you cannot see it
data.expected_result: The button to create the category should be a more visible color (black/grey)
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on light theme - Create a server - Press the 3 dots that are near the server name/press and hold on server - Select create a category - Observe there's like no button to create the category - (the button is somewhere in the top right corner, but it's invisible)
